title: 325. How to Train Your Dragon Child
description: Every 12 years, there's a spike in births among certain communities across the globe, including the U.S. Why? Because the Year of the Dragon, according to Chinese folk belief, confers power, fortune, and more. We look at what happens to Dragon babies when they grow up, and why timing your kid's birth based on the zodiac isn't as ridiculous it sounds.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
